title: Corporate-Owned Work Profile Devices
description: Summarizes the count of corporate-owned work profile Android devices by OS version.
query:
IntuneDevices
| where OS contains "Android (corporate-owned work profile)"
| summarize dcount(DeviceId) by OSVersion
| render columnchart

| summarize dcount(DeviceId) by OSVersion

title: Compliant Devices
description: Summarizes the count of compliant devices by OS description and version.
query:
IntuneDeviceComplianceOrg 
| where isnotempty(DeviceName)
| where ComplianceState == "Compliant"
| summarize count() by OSDescription, OSVersion

title: Non-Compliant Devices
description: Summarizes the count of non-compliant devices by OS description and version.
query:
IntuneDeviceComplianceOrg 
| where isnotempty(DeviceName)
| where ComplianceState == "Not compliant"
| summarize count() by OSDescription, OSVersion

title: Compliance Failures by Operating System
description: Summarizes compliance failures by operating system.
query:
let ComplianceLogs=
IntuneOperationalLogs 
| where OperationName == "Compliance" 
| project TimeGenerated, Properties;
ComplianceLogs
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| join (
ComplianceLogs
| extend myJson = todynamic(Properties)
| project-away Properties
| extend IntuneDeviceId=tostring(myJson["IntuneDeviceId"])
| project TimeGenerated, IntuneDeviceId
| summarize TimeGenerated=max(TimeGenerated) by IntuneDeviceId    
) on TimeGenerated
| project-away TimeGenerated1, IntuneDeviceId  
| extend myJson=todynamic(Properties)
| project-away Properties
| extend DeviceOperatingSystem=tostring(myJson["DeviceOperatingSystem"])
| summarize FailureCount=count() by DeviceOperatingSystem
| sort by FailureCount desc

title: Defender for Endpoint Compliance Health
description: Lists devices with MDE threat levels that are not secured.
query:
IntuneDeviceComplianceOrg
| where isnotempty(DeviceHealthThreatLevel)
| where DeviceHealthThreatLevel != "Secured"
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, DeviceId, OS, UserName, DeviceHealthThreatLevel

title: Audit Events Summary
description: Summarizes all audit events by operation name.
query:
IntuneAuditLogs 
| summarize Auditevents = count() by OperationName 
| sort by Auditevents

title: Managed Device Operations
description: Summarizes all managed device operations audited.
query:
IntuneAuditLogs 
| where OperationName contains "Managed Device"
| summarize count() by OperationName
| render piechart

title: Configuration Changes in Intune
description: Lists changes to configurations in Intune, including policies and values.
query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "patch"
| extend User = todynamic(Properties).Actor.UPN
| extend Apps = todynamic(Properties).Actor.ApplicationName
| extend Device = todynamic(Properties).TargetObjectIds
| extend Policy = replace_regex(tostring(todynamic(Properties).TargetDisplayNames), @'\["\]', "")
| mv-expand todynamic(Properties).Targets[0].ModifiedProperties
| extend Configuration = todynamic(Properties_Targets_0_ModifiedProperties).Name
| extend ['New Value'] = todynamic(Properties_Targets_0_ModifiedProperties).New
| extend ['Old Value'] = todynamic(Properties_Targets_0_ModifiedProperties).Old
| where isnotempty(['Old Value'])
| where isnotempty(['New Value'])
| where isnotempty(User)
| project Time = TimeGenerated, Policy, Configuration, ['New Value'], ['Old Value'], User
| sort by Time desc

title: Update Alert Distribution
description: Displays the distribution of Windows update alerts by alert subtype

title: Safeguard Hold by Target Version
description: Summarizes the count of Safeguard Hold alerts by target Windows feature update version
query:
UCUpdateAlert
| where UpdateCategory == "WindowsFeatureUpdate" and AlertSubtype == "SafeguardHold"
| summarize count() by TargetVersion

title: Detailed Safeguard Hold Analysis
description: Provides a detailed breakdown of Safeguard Holds by ID with device count for each hold
query:
let _SafeguardHold = "SafeguardHold";
let _SafeguardHoldID = "ALL";
let SafeguardHolds = UCUpdateAlert
    | where AlertSubtype == _SafeguardHold
    | extend SafeguardHoldIDs = parse_json(AlertData).safeguardHoldIDs
    | extend TotalSafeguards = array_length(SafeguardHoldIDs)
    | mv-expand SafeguardHoldID=SafeguardHoldIDs
    | extend SafeguardHoldID=iff(isempty(SafeguardHoldID), "Unknown", tostring(SafeguardHoldID))
    | extend DeviceDetail = "View more"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AzureADDeviceId, SafeguardHoldID
    | summarize DeviceCount=count(AzureADDeviceId) by SafeguardHoldID, DeviceDetail
    | where iff(_SafeguardHoldID has "ALL", true, _SafeguardHoldID has SafeguardHoldID)
    | order by DeviceCount desc
    | project-reorder SafeguardHoldID, DeviceCount, DeviceDetail;
SafeguardHolds;

title: Safeguard Hold Snapshot Analysis
description: Analyzes Safeguard Holds from a specific point in time with device counts by hold ID
query:
let _SnapshotTime = datetime(2023-01-01T06:00:00Z);
let _SafeguardHold = "SafeguardHold";
let _SafeguardHoldID = "ALL";
let SafeguardHolds = UCUpdateAlert
    | where TimeGenerated >= _SnapshotTime
    | where AlertSubtype == _SafeguardHold
    | extend SafeguardHoldIDs = parse_json(AlertData).safeguardHoldIDs
    | extend TotalSafeguards = array_length(SafeguardHoldIDs)
    | mv-expand SafeguardHoldID=SafeguardHoldIDs
    | extend SafeguardHoldID=iff(isempty(SafeguardHoldID), "Unknown", tostring(SafeguardHoldID))
    | extend DeviceDetail = "View more"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AzureADDeviceId, SafeguardHoldID
    | summarize DeviceCount=count(AzureADDeviceId) by SafeguardHoldID, DeviceDetail
    | where iff(_SafeguardHoldID has "ALL", true, _SafeguardHoldID has SafeguardHoldID)
    | order by DeviceCount desc
    | project-reorder SafeguardHoldID, DeviceCount, DeviceDetail;
SafeguardHolds;

title: Feature Update Deployment Progress
description: Tracks the deployment progress of Windows feature updates across your organization
query:
UCClient
| where isnotempty(OSTargetBuild)
| summarize DeviceCount=count() by OSVersion, OSTargetBuild, DeploymentStatus
| order by OSVersion asc, OSTargetBuild desc

title: Update Compliance Status Overview
description: Provides an overview of update compliance status across all managed devices
query:
UCClient
| summarize
    Total=count(),
    Compliant=countif(OSComplianceStatus == "Compliant"),
    NonCompliant=countif(OSComplianceStatus == "Not Compliant")
| extend ComplianceRate = round(100.0 * Compliant / Total, 2)
| project Total, Compliant, NonCompliant, ComplianceRate

title: Device Scan Failures
description: Identifies devices with Windows Update scan failures that need remediation
query:
UCUpdateAlert
| where AlertSubtype == "ScanFailed"
| summarize
    LastFailure=max(TimeGenerated),
    FailureCount=count()
    by DeviceName, AzureADDeviceId, OSVersion
| order by FailureCount desc

title: Windows Security Update Compliance
description: Tracks compliance status specifically for security updates across your Windows devices
query:
UCClient
| where isnotempty(SecurityUpdateComplianceStatus)
| summarize DeviceCount=count() by SecurityUpdateComplianceStatus
| render piechart

title: Windows Update Connectivity Issues
description: Identifies devices experiencing connectivity issues with Windows Update servers
query:
UCUpdateAlert
| where AlertSubtype in ("UpdateServiceConnectivityFailedAlert", "ContentDownloadFailed")
| summarize
    LastFailure=max(TimeGenerated),
    FailureCount=count(),
    AlertTypes=make_set(AlertSubtype)
    by DeviceName, AzureADDeviceId
| order by FailureCount desc
